name: typescript-presentation
description: A client & server application that give a Reveal.js-based TypeScript presentation.

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.clean: npm run clean-server && npm run clean-client
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run start-server && npm run start-client
